title: Calcium Correction for Hypoalbuminemia
desc: The Calcium Correction for Hypoalbuminemia calculates a corrected calcium level for patients with hypoalbuminemia.

orgreference.text: Payne RB, Little AJ, Williams RB, Milner JR. Interpretation of Serum Calcium in Patients with Abnormal Serum Proteins. British Medical Journal. 1973;4(5893):643-646

data.evidence:
Corrected Calcium = (0.8 * (Normal Albumin - Pt's Albumin)) + Serum Ca

Note: formula assumes albumin units in g/dL.
